Header: President inspects Egoda Kelaniya temple renovations
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena has inspected renovations to the historic Egoda Kelaniya identified also as the Kithsirimewan Kalyani Rajamaha Viharaya. The President who went to the historic Egoda-kenaliya took part in religious practices. Thereafter he inspected the renovations to the temple. The renovation activities at the temple were launched on a request by the Chief Monk of Kelaniya Rajamaha Viharaya Venerable Professor Kollupitiye Mahinda Sangharakhitha Thera and on the instructions of the President. The three armed forces are assisting in the renovations of the temple.
